metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

| {Scoped}
| {ActorsFilter}
| where Category in ({Categories})
| where OperationName in ({Operations})
| extend Section = split(OperationName, '.')[0]
| project ['Time'] = TimeGenerated,
          ['Actor'] = ActorUPN,
          ['Scope'] = ScopeType,
          ['Display Name'] = ScopeDisplayName,
          ['Project Name'] = iif('{Scoped:label}' =~ 'Yes', ProjectName, 'Not applicable'),
          ['Category'] = CategoryDisplayName,
          Section,
          ['Operation Name'] = OperationName,
          Details,
          ActivityId

| {ActorsFilter}
| where Category in ({Categories})
| where OperationName in ({Operations})

| project ['Procedure'] = Data.CallerProcedure,
          ['Result'] = Data.DeploymentResult,
          ['Environment'] = Data.EnvironmentName,
          ['Pipeline'] = Data.PipelineName,
          ['Run'] = Data.RunName,

| where Category in ({Categories})
| where OperationName in ({Operations})

| project ['Operation'] = split(OperationName, '.')[-1],

          ['Category'] = CategoryDisplayName,
          ['Namespace'] = Data.NamespaceName,
          Details","size":0,"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspaces}"],"sortBy":[]},"conditionalVisibilities":[{"parameterName":"ActivityId","comparison":"isNotEqualTo"},{"parameterName":"Section","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Security"}],"name":"query - 4"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureDevOpsAuditing

          Details
